short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the lineup position of a Yahoo! Fantasy players.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that embeds the current lineup position of a Yahoo! or ESPN fantasy hockey player directly onto the website. A coloured icon indicates the lineup position according to data from DailyFaceoff.

Updates:

v4.0
- Support for the ESPN Fantasy site!

v3.1
- Added fix for Utah Hockey Club
- Minor bug fix for icons not showing after search

v3.0
- Resolved critical break from updated Yahoo UI
- Added Moneypuck stat icon to display winning odds for goaltenders
- Automatic update of data every 1hr
